data.prayer: Lord, use Google search to lead people in South Garo Hills, Meghalaya, India to the gospel today.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of South Garo Hills, Meghalaya, India
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, make the 1,566 believers in South Garo Hills to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 140,834 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 142,400 citizens of South Garo Hills, Meghalaya, India, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in South Garo Hills, Meghalaya, India to be generous so that they would be worthy of greater investment by you.

Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Koch (Hindu traditions) people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the county of South Garo Hills, Meghalaya, India who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.prayer: Jesus, purify the 1,566 believers in the county of South Garo Hills to not just be hearers, but doers of your Word.
data.verse: Blessed is the one who reads aloud the words of this prophecy, and blessed are those who hear it and take to heart what is written in it, because the time is near.

data.section_summary:
the county of South Garo Hills, Meghalaya, India has a population of 142,400.

We estimate South Garo Hills has 1,566 people who might know Jesus, 1,728 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 139,106 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in South Garo Hills with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

location.name: South Garo Hills
